type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.toolchain.GccPlatformToolChain
type.description: GCC specific settings for the tools used to build for a particular platform.

method.name: getAssembler
method.description: Returns the settings to use for the assembler.

method.name: getCppCompiler
method.description: Returns the settings to use for the C++ compiler.

method.name: getLinker
method.description: Returns the settings to use for the linker.

method.name: getObjcCompiler
method.description: Returns the settings to use for the Objective-C compiler.

method.name: getObjcppCompiler
method.description: Returns the settings to use for the Objective-C++ compiler.

method.name: getStaticLibArchiver
method.description: Returns the settings to use for the archiver.

method.name: getcCompiler
method.description: Returns the settings to use for the C compiler.

property.name: assembler
property.description: Returns the settings to use for the assembler.

property.name: cCompiler
property.description: Returns the settings to use for the C compiler.

property.name: cppCompiler
property.description: Returns the settings to use for the C++ compiler.

property.name: linker
property.description: Returns the settings to use for the linker.

property.name: objcCompiler
property.description: Returns the settings to use for the Objective-C compiler.

property.name: objcppCompiler
property.description: Returns the settings to use for the Objective-C++ compiler.

property.name: staticLibArchiver
property.description: Returns the settings to use for the archiver.
